Live sessions, courses, cohorts and beyond

The next chapter of The Neural Maze

Miguel Otero Pedrido
Oct 01, 2025
16
4
4
Share

Last week, I promised to share with you the next steps of The Neural Maze.

Today’s email is exactly that: a roadmap into where we’re heading together.

When I first started this project, my goal was simple. I wanted to create a place where we could explore how real ML / AI Engineering looks like. Over time, The Neural Maze has grown into more than just a newsletter …

It has become a community. And now, it’s time to take it further.

A few weeks ago, I’ve officially launched a premium tier.

This premium tier allows me to dedicate more time and resources to creating content that goes even deeper, while also making this community sustainable in the long term.

In short, your support keeps The Neural Maze alive and growing.

And of course, I want to give back with even more value.

Ready to see what’s inside?

Here’s everything you’ll unlock as a Premium Subscriber! 👇

👉 Join Premium to unlock the 4 hands-on courses, in-depth guides, project templates, and career advice. Everything you need to grow as an AI / ML engineer.

Exclusive Substack Content

From now on, premium subscribers will receive a stream of exclusive content:

  • Long-form deep dives into advanced topics.

  • Video posts to make learning more immersive.

  • Actionable code you can download and start playing with

Think of these articles as my personal “thank you” — written not just for you, but with you in mind 😉

👉 Here are a few examples of what’s already inside the premium library:

  • One cookiecutter to build Agents in seconds

  • Building Agent projects without losing your mind

  • 6 hands-on projects to grow as an AI Engineer

If you are a free subscriber, don’t worry!

You’ll continue receiving regular posts. Insights, updates, and accesible articles that anyone can learn from. The Neural Maze started as a free newsletter, and I’ll keep honoring that commitment.

This way, whether you’re free or premium, you’ll always find value here.

💡 But of course, premium unlocks the full experience.

Monthly Q&A Sessions

Starting this month, we’ll kick off monthly Q&As for premium subscribers. These will be informal but structured:

  1. I’ll share updated about The Neural Maze. New courses, new ideas, etc.

  2. Then, I’ll open the floor to your questions. Anything goes: whether it’s about coding, projects, learning strategies, or even where I see The Neural Maze heading.

👉 Don’t worry about missing out: you’ll receive emails with all the details. I’ll also post reminders in the chat and on LinkedIn so you always know when and how to join.

Premium subscribers will get a dedicated email beforehand where you can submit questions in advance, so your voice helps shape the conversation.

Live Sessions

You already know I love creating end-to-end courses. Now, I want to bring those courses to life.

For premium subscribers, I’ll be running live code walkthroughs. Here’s how it will work:

  • Each lesson starts with a detailed written article (the deep dive).

  • A few days later, we’ll meet for a live session where I’ll walk through the code, step by step.

  • You’ll be able to ask questions in real time and see the theory turned into practice.

These sessions will be lesson-based and interactive, making the learning process much more dynamic.

Think of it as sitting in a classroom together, but online.

Live sessions will be part of our open-source courses. That means whenever a new course is about to launch, I’ll send emails with all the dates so you can plan ahead.

Our next course

I don’t want to give away too much yet … but I can share this:

The next course is already in the works. It will be about Realtime Voice Agents for phone calls (check the diagram below).

👉 Expect the first article to go live on November 5th, with the first live session scheduled for Sunday, November 9th.

Don’t worry about remembering dates right now. I’ll keep you updated with all the details via email (and share reminders in the chat and on LinkedIn).

A look into the future

This is where things get exciting.

Beyond live sessions and premium articles, I’ve started laying the foundation for something bigger.

The Neural Maze Academy

The Academy will be a dedicated platform, a central hub where we can bring everything together:

  • 🔴 All live calls and Q&As

  • 📚 Course materials, code sharing, and resources

  • 🎓 Evergreen courses and, later on, cohort-based learning opportunities

Right now, this is just the beginning. But in time, I want The Neural Maze Academy to become the place where you can always come back, learn, and grow at your own pace — while staying connected to a community of peers.

👉 Premium subscribers will get automatic access to this platform. In just a few weeks, you’ll receive an email (with a short video walkthrough from me) explaining how to explore the platform and the different channels you’ll find inside.

What should you do now?

Honestly, not much!

If you’re already a premium subscriber, you’ll receive an email in the coming weeks with instructions on how to join the platform where live sessions and Q&As will take place.

If you’re still on the free tier, now’s the perfect time to upgrade. Premium subscribers are the first to access all of these new experiences — and your support makes it possible for me to keep building.

Any questions? Feel free to drop it in the comments!

Thank you for being here at the start of this next chapter.

I’m excited to explore it with you 🫶
